Spell Description: Creates a sound or an image of an object within range.
Hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object.
Hurl a bubble of acid
Briefly reduce physical harm
Strike with thunder if foe moves
Shape non-magical Fire
Create a Bonfire that fills a 5-foot cube
You create up to four torch-sized lights
Minor nature tricks
beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range
briefly Charm a Creature
cause numbing frost to form on one creature
Boost ally’s skill check
Use Wind to Push or disperse
Illuminate objects
Use a Lash of Lightning to yank a foe closer
Crate a spectral hand you control
envelope 3 pebbles with magic
Repair any object so long as the damage doesn't exceed a 1-foot cube
Whisper across distance
Drive a Spike of Psychic energy into the mond of a creature
Shape terrain in a 5-foot cube
puff of noxious gas from your palm
Minor magical tricks
Cold beam slows foes
Boost saving throws briefly
Flame-like radiance descends on a creature
Shape water in a 5-foot cube
Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch
create a momentary circle of spectral blades that sweep around you
Yor Voice Booms throughout a Radius
vine-like whip covered in thorns that lashes out at your command toward a creature
create a burst of thunderous sound
grants you a brief insight into the target’s defenses
